replies.message: We're sorry you feel that way, Sal. We're constantly working to improve the Facebook experience for everyone and if there's something we can do to improve yours, please let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1apJAYz. -Jenny
Why are you on here?
Privacy concerns.
Lillie Demps Wood, have a blessed day.
Im refuse to get in a debate with a complete stranger, also i dont owe you an explanation for my feelings.
it's so simple guys, if you don't like something delete yourself from it so that you will not be disturb by others. Just face on the mirror and talk to yourself.

Sal - maybe a little perspective will help.  I am 64.  When I was a young girl my mother told me to never write anything down on paper that I didn't want the whole world to see.  That was before, obviously, the techology that we have now.  I consider that EVERYTHING I writenon FB or my computer is open to the world.  I would never assume that anything is private - because once you click that button, there it is.  Save your private stuff for other ways of communication.
I love Facebook and just assume that if you dont like it why complain??  Just leave.
I agree with Joe. How am I to get into arguments with people if I can't even comment?!?!
Why don't you like it?
No one is forcing you to be on Facebook.
Lol, BethAnn
Lol commented on Facebook
Get to stepping fool!
Yet here you are... On Facebook...
I think he was making a funny guys.
COMPLAINS ABOUT FACEBOOK.....HAS A FACE BOOK! (Face-palmed)
Smh
I don't like rude people either, i still polity deal with them.

"Get to steppin fool" Rica Xavier grow up.  
Ray Peila... Thank you. 
Mary McDonald Olson im smart enough i have already figured that out myself at the age of 33. 
I shouldn't even waste my time responding to comments like the above. This shows the direction the world is goin in, sad.

Nicole Ladson since you politely asked, i don't like how fb has turned into nothing but advertisments, i also do not like how i dont see post from today until tomorrow. I also dont like how certain pages i consistently like will all of a sudden stop showing up and others start showing up.. As far as the privacy concern go... If i post on fb id like my stuff to stay on fb. I dont like my info sold for their own benefit. 
For the rest of you here is a example for you. Theres days i do not like my car, a very nice one ill add... I dont just up and trade it in. Im sure theres days you dont like your spouses, do you go file for divorce? Apples and oranges but anyone with a little common sense will understand what im saying. God bless you all.
